name: Aguabana
description:
PITCH

20 Years ago, in Havana, people were transformed into fishmen. To restore the city’s peace, you will have to face The BombShells, a Predator Gang. They think that they were made predators for a reason: to sow chaos and fear in the heart of Preys! To put them in their place, work as a team, and use various vehicle modules and weapons fresh from your gang’s garage to win combats and take over the BombShells’ territory!
